Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Values to select from, use '...' for a range. Change using msg.range.

Set current value. Change using msg.payload.

Unit to show after numeric values. Change using msg.unit.

Label for control. Change using msg.label.

Place label above control, else to the left. Change using msg.label_above.
